sections.text: anuvAkaM - 1

cittiqH sruk | ciqttamAjya$m | vAgvEdi#H | AdhI#taM baqr.qhiH | kEtO# aqgniH | vij~jA#tamaqgniH | vAkpa#tiqr.qhOtA$ | mana# upavaqktA | prAqNO haqviH | sAmA$ddhvaqryuH ( ) || vAca#spatE vidhE nAmann | viqdhEma# tEq nAma# | viqdhEstva-maqsmAkaqM nAma# | vAqcaspatiqH sOma#M pibatu | A&smAsu# nRuqmNaM dhAqthsvAhA$ || 1 (15)
anuvAkaM - 2

pRuqthiqvI hOtA$ | dyaura#ddhvaqryuH | ruqdrO$&gnIt | bRuhaqspati#rupavaqktA || vAca#spatE vAqcO vIqryE#Na | saMBRu#tata-mEqnAya#kShyasE | yaja#mAnAyaq vArya$m | A suvaqskara#smai | vAqcaspatiqH sOma#M pibati | jaqjanaqdindra#mindriqyAyaq svAhA$ || 2 (10)
anuvAkaM - 3
aqgnir. hOtA$ | aqSvinA$&ddhvaqryU | tvaShTAq&gnIt | miqtra u#pavaqktA || sOmaqH sOma#sya purOqgAH | SuqkraH Suqkrasya# purOqgAH | SrAqtAsta# indraq sOmA$H | vAtA#pEr. havanaqSrutaqH svAhA$ || 3 (8)
anuvAkaM - 4

sUrya#M tEq cakShu#H | vAta#M prAqNaH | dyAM pRuqShTham | aqntari#kShamAqtmA | a~ggai$r yaqj~jam | pRuqthiqvI(gm) SarI#raiH || vAca#spaqtE&cCi#drayA vAqcA | acCi#drayA juqhvA$ | diqvi dE#vAqvRudhaq(gm)q hOtrAq mEra#yasvaq svAhA$ || 4 (9)
anuvAkaM - 5

maqhAha#viqrq. hOtA$ | saqtyaha#viraddhvaqryuH | acyu#tapAjA aqgnIt | acyu#tamanA upavaqktA | aqnAqdhRuqShyaScA$ pratidhRuqShyaSca# yaqj~jasyA#Bigaqrau | aqyAsya# udgAqtA || vAca#spatE hRudvidhE nAmann | viqdhEma# tEq nAma# | viqdhEstvamaqsmAkaqM nAma# | vAqcaspatiqH sOma#mapAt ( ) | mA daivyaqstantuqH CEdiq mA ma#nuqShya#H | namO# diqvE | nama#H pRuthiqvyai svAhA$ || 5 (13)
anuvAkaM - 6
vAgGOtA$ | dIqkShA patnI$ | vAtO$&ddhvaqryuH | ApO#&BigaqraH | manO# haqviH | tapa#si juhOmi || BUrBuvaqssuva#H | brahma# svayaqmBu | brahma#NE svayaqmBuvEq svAhA$ || 6 (9)
anuvAkaM - 7

brAqhmaqNa Eka#hOtA | sa yaqj~jaH | sa mE# dadAtu praqjAM paqSUn puShTiqM ~MyaSa#H | yaqj~jaSca# mE BUyAt || aqgnir dvihO#tA | sa BaqrtA | sa mE# dadAtu praqjAM paqSUn puShTiqM ~MyaSa#H | BaqrtA ca# mE BUyAt || pRuqthiqvI trihO#tA | sa pra#tiqShThA | 7 (10)

sa mE# dadAtu praqjAM paqSUn puShTiqM ~MyaSa#H | praqtiqShThA ca# mE BUyAt || aqntari#kShaqM catu#r.hOtA | sa viqShThAH | sa mE# dadAtu praqjAM paqSUn puShTiqM ~MyaSa#H | viqShThASca# mE BUyAt || vAqyuH pa~jca#hOtA | sa prAqNaH | sa mE# dadAtu praqjAM paqSUn puShTiqM ~MyaSa#H | prAqNaSca# mE BUyAt || 8 (10)

caqndramAqH ShaDDhO#tA | sa RuqtUn ka#lpayAti | sa mE# dadAtu praqjAM paqSUn puShTiqM ~MyaSa#H | Ruqtava#Sca mE kalpantAm || anna(gm)# saqptahO#tA | sa prAqNasya# prAqNaH | sa mE# dadAtu praqjAM paqSUn puShTiqM ~MyaSa#H | prAqNasya# ca mE prAqNO BU#yAt || dyauraqShTahO#tA | sO#&nAdhRuqShyaH | 9 (10)

sa mE# dadAtu praqjAM paqSUn puShTiqM ~MyaSa#H | aqnAqdhRuqShyaSca# BUyAsam || AqdiqtyO nava#hOtA | sa tE#jaqsvI | sa mE# dadAtu praqjAM paqSUn puShTiqM ~MyaSa#H | tEqjaqsvI ca# BUyAsam || praqjApa#tiqr daSa#hOtA | sa iqda(gm) sarva$m | sa mE# dadAtu praqjAM paqSUn puShTiqM ~MyaSa#H | sarva#M ca mE BUyAt ( ) || 10 (10) Special Korvai (brAqhmaqNO yaqj~jO$&gnirBaqrtA pRu#thiqvI pra#tiqShThA&ntari#kShaM ~MviqShThA vAqyuH prAqNaScaqndramA# RuqtUnannaq(gm)q sa prAqNasya# prAqNO dyaura#nAdhRuqShya A#diqtyaH sa tE#jaqsvI praqjApa#tiqH sa iqda(gm) sarvaq(gm)q sarva#M ca mE BUyAt)
anuvAkaM - 8

aqgnir yaju#rBiH | saqviqtA stOmai$H | indra# ukthAmaqdaiH | miqtrAvaru#NAvAqSiShA$ | a~ggi#rasOq dhiShNi#yairaqgniBi#H | maqruta#H sadOhavirddhAqnAByA$m | ApaqH prOkSha#NIBiH | OSha#dhayO baqrq.hiShA$ | adi#tiqrvEdyA$ | sOmO# dIqkShayA$ | 11 (10)

tvaShTEqddhmEna# | viShNu#r yaqj~jEna# | vasa#vaq AjyE#na | AqdiqtyA dakShi#NABiH | viSvE# dEqvA UqrjA | pUqShA sva#gAkAqrENa# | bRuhaqspati#H purOqdhayA$ | praqjApa#tirudgIqthEna# | aqntari#kShaM paqvitrE#Na | vAqyuH pAtrai$H ( ) | aqha(gg) SraqddhayA$ || 12 (11)
anuvAkaM - 9

sEnEndra#sya | dhEnAq bRuhaqspatE$H | paqtthyA# pUqShNaH | vAgvAqyOH | dIqkShA sOma#sya | pRuqthiqvya#gnEH | vasU#nAM gAyaqtrI | ruqdrANA$M triqShTuk | AqdiqtyAnAqM jaga#tI | viShNO#ranuqShTuk | 13 (10)

varu#Nasya viqrAT | yaqj~jasya# paq~gktiH | praqjApa#tEqranu#matiH | miqtrasya# SraqddhA | saqviqtuH prasU#tiH | sUrya#syaq marI#ciH | caqndrama#sO rOhiqNI | RuShI#NAmarundhaqtI | paqrjanya#sya viqdyut | cata#srOq diSa#H ( ) | cata#srO&vAntaradiqSAH | aha#Scaq rAtri#Sca | kRuqShiScaq vRuShTi#Sca | tviShiqScApa#citiSca | ApaqScauSha#dhayaSca | Urkca# sUqnRutA# ca dEqvAnAqM patna#yaH || 14 (16)
anuvAkaM - 10

dEqvasya# tvA saviqtuH pra#saqvE | aqSvinO$r bAqhuByA$m | pUqShNO hastA$ByAqM prati#gRuhNAmi | rAjA$ tvAq varu#NO nayatu dEvi dakShiNEq&gnayEq hira#Nyam | tEnA#mRutaqtvama#SyAm | vayO# dAqtrE | mayOq mahya#mastu pratigrahIqtrE | ka iqdaM kasmA# adAt | kAmaqH kAmA#ya | kAmO# dAqtA | 15 (10)

kAma#H pratigrahIqtA | kAma(gm)# samuqdramAvi#Sa | kAmE#na tvAq prati#gRuhNAmi | kAmaiqtattE$ | EqShA tE# kAmaq dakShi#NA | uqttAqnastvA$&&~ggIraqsaH prati#gRuhNAtu | sOmA#yaq vAsa#H | ruqdrAyaq gAm | varu#NAqyASva$m | praqjApa#tayEq puru#Sham | 16 (10)

mana#vEq talpa$m | tvaShTrEq&jAm | pUqShNE&vi$m | nir.Ru#tyA aSvataragardaqBau | hiqmava#tO haqstina$m | gaqndhaqrvAq-PsaqrABya#H-sragala~gkaraqNE | viSvE$ByO dEqvEByO# dhAqnyam | vAqcE&nna$m | brahma#Na Odaqnam | saqmuqdrAyApa#H | 17 (10)

uqttAqnAyA$~ggIraqsAyAna#H | vaiqSvAqnaqrAyaq ratha$m || vaiqSvAqnaqraH praqtnathAq nAkaqmAru#hat | diqvaH pRuqShThaM Banda#mAnaH suqmanma#BiH | sa pU$rvaqvajjaqnaya#jjaqntavEq dhana$m | saqmAqnama#jmAq pari#yAtiq jAgRu#viH || rAjA$ tvAq varu#NO nayatu dEvi dakShiNE vaiSvAnaqrAyaq ratha$m | tEnA#mRutaqtvama#SyAm | vayO# dAqtrE | mayOq mahya#mastu pratigrahIqtrE ( ) | 18 (10)

ka iqdaM kasmA# adAt | kAmaqH kAmA#ya | kAmO# dAqtA | kAma#H pratigrahIqtA | kAma(gm)# samuqdramAvi#Sa | kAmE#na tvAq prati#gRuhNAmi | kAmaiqtattE$ | EqShA tE# kAmaq dakShi#NA | uqttAqnastvA$&&~ggIraqsaH prati#gRuhNAtu || 19 (9)
anuvAkaM - 11

suqvarNa#M GaqrmaM pari#vEda vEqnam | indra#syAqtmAna#M daSaqdhA cara#ntam | aqntaH sa#muqdrE mana#sAq cara#ntam | brahmA&nva#vindaqd daSa#hOtAraqmarNE$ | aqntaH pravi#ShTaH SAqstA janA#nAm | EkaqH sanba#huqdhA vi#cAraH | Saqta(gm) SuqkrANiq yatraikaqM Bava#nti | sarvEq vEdAq yatraikaqM Bava#nti | sarvEq hOtA#rOq yatraikaqM Bava#nti | saq mAna#sIna AqtmA janA#nAm | 20 (10)

aqntaH pravi#ShTaH SAqstA janA#nAq(gm)q sarvA$tmA | sarvA$H praqjA yatraikaqM Bava#nti | catu#r.hOtArOq yatra# saqmpadaqM gacCa#nti dEqvaiH | saq mAna#sIna AqtmA janA#nAm || brahmEndra#maqgniM jaga#taH pratiqShThAm | diqva AqtmAna(gm)# saviqtAraqM bRuhaqspati$m | catu#r.hOtAraM praqdiSO&nu# klaqptam | vAqcO vIqrya#M tapaqsA&nva#vindat || aqntaH pravi#ShTaM kaqrtAra#mEqtam | tvaShTA#ra(gm) rUqpANi# vikuqrvanta#M ~MvipaqScim | 21 (10)

aqmRuta#sya prAqNaM ~Myaqj~jamEqtam | catu#r.hOtRuNAmAqtmAna#M kaqvayOq nici#kyuH || aqntaH pravi#ShTaM kaqrtAra#mEqtam | dEqvAnAqM bandhuq nihi#taqM guhA#su | aqmRutE#na klaqptaM ~Myaqj~jamEqtam | catu#r.hOtRuNAmAqtmAna#M kaqvayOq nici#kyuH || SaqtaM niqyutaqH pari#vEdaq viSvA# viqSvavA#raH | viSva#miqdaM ~MvRu#NAti | indra#syAqtmA nihi#taqH pa~jca#hOtA | aqmRuta#M dEqvAnAqmAyu#H praqjAnA$m || 22 (10)

indraq(gm)q rAjA#na(gm) saviqtAra#mEqtam | vAqyOrAqtmAna#M kaqvayOq nici#kyuH | raqSmi(gm) ra#SmIqnAM maddhyEq tapa#ntam | Ruqtasya# paqdE kaqvayOq nipA$nti || ya A$NDakOqSE Buva#naM biqBarti# | ani#rBiNNaqH sannatha# lOqkAn. viqcaShTE$ | yasyA$NDakOqSa(gm) SuShma#mAqhuH prAqNamulba$m | tEna# klRuqptO#&mRutE#nAqhama#smi || suqvarNaqM kOSaq(gm)q raja#sAq parI#vRutam | dEqvAnA$M ~MvasuqdhAnI$M ~MviqrAja$m | 23 (10)

aqmRuta#sya pUqrNAntAmu# kaqlAM ~Mvica#kShatE | pAdaq(gm)q ShaDDhO#tuqrna kilA#vi vithsE || yEnaqrtava#H pa~jcaqdhOta klaqqptAH | uqta vA# ShaqDdhA manaqsOta klRuqqptAH | ta(gm) ShaDDhO#tAramRuqtuBiqH kalpa#mAnam | Ruqtasya# paqdE kaqvayOq nipA$nti || aqntaH pravi#ShTaM kaqrtAra#mEqtam | aqntaScaqndrama#siq mana#sAq cara#ntam | saqhaiva santaqM na vijA#nanti dEqvAH | indra#syAqtmAna(gm)# SataqdhA cara#ntam || 24 (10)

indrOq rAjAq jaga#tOq ya ISE$ | saqptahO#tA saptaqdhA viklRu#ptaH || parE#Naq tantu#M pariShiqcyamA#nam | aqntarA#diqtyE mana#sAq cara#ntam | dEqvAnAq(gm)q hRuda#yaqM brahmA&nva#vindat || brahmaiqtadbrahma#Naq ujja#BAra | aqrka(gg) ScOta#nta(gm) sariqrasyaq maddhyE$ || A yasmin$th saqpta pEra#vaH | mEha#nti bahuqlA(gg) Sriya$m | baqhvaqSvAmi#ndraq gOma#tIm || 25 (10)

acyu#tAM bahuqlA(gg) Sriya$m | sa hari#rvasuqvitta#maH | pEqrurindrA#ya pinvatE || baqhvaqSvAmi#ndraq gOma#tIm | acyu#tAM bahuqlA(gg) Sriya$m | mahyaqmindrOq niya#cCatu || Saqta(gm) SaqtA a#sya yuqktA harI#NAm | aqrvA~gA yA#tuq vasu#BI raqSmirindra#H | prama(gm)ha#mANO bahuqlA(gg) Sriya$m | raqSmirindra#H saviqtA mEq niya#cCatu || 26 (10)

GRuqtaM tEjOq madhu#madindriqyam | mayyaqyamaqgnirda#dhAtu || hari#H pataq~ggaH pa#TaqrI su#paqrNaH | diqviqkShayOq naBa#sAq ya Eti# | sa naq indra#H kAmavaqraM da#dAtu || pa~jcA#raM caqkraM pari#vartatE pRuqthu | hira#NyajyOtiH sariqrasyaq maddhyE$ | aja#sraqM jyOtiqrnaBa#sAq sarpa#dEti | sa naq indra#H kAmavaqraM da#dAtu || saqpta yu#~jjantiq rathaqmEka#cakram | 27 (10)

EkOq aSvO# vahati saptanAqmA | triqnABi# caqkramaqjaraqmana#rvam | yEnEqmA viSvAq Buva#nAni tasthuH || BaqdraM paSya#ntaq upa#sEduqragrE$ | tapO# dIqkShAmRuSha#yaH suvaqrvida#H | tata#H kShaqtraM balaqmOja#Sca jAqtam | tadaqsmai dEqvA aqBi saM na#mantu || SvEqta(gm) raqSmiM bO#BuqjyamA#nam | aqpAM nEqtAraqM Buva#nasya gOqpAm | indraqM nici#kyuH paraqmE vyO#mann || 28 (10)

rOhi#NIH pi~ggaqlA Eka#rUpAH | kShara#ntIH pi~ggaqlA Eka#rUpAH | Saqta(gm) saqhasrA#Ni praqyutA#niq nAvyA#nAm || aqyaM ~MyaSSvEqtO raqSmiH | pariq sarva#miqdaM jaga#t | praqjAM paqSUn dhanA#ni | aqsmAka#M dadAtu || SvEqtO raqSmiH pariq sarva#M baBUva | suvaqnmahya#M paqSUn. viqSvarU#pAn || paqtaq~ggamaqktamasu#rasya mAqyayA$ | 29 (10)

hRuqdA pa#Syantiq mana#sA manIqShiNa#H | saqmuqdrE aqntaH kaqvayOq vica#kShatE | marI#cInAM paqdami#cCanti vEqdhasa#H || paqtaq~ggO vAcaqM mana#sA biBarti | tAM ga#ndhaqrvO#&vadaqd garBE# aqntaH | tAM dyOta#mAnA(gg) svaqrya#M manIqShAm | Ruqtasya# paqdE kaqvayOq nipA$nti || yE grAqmyAH paqSavO# viqSvarU#pAH | virU#pAqH santO# bahuqdhaika#rUpAH | aqgnistA(gm) agrEq pramu#mOktu dEqvaH | 30 (10)

praqjApa#tiH praqjayA# sam~MvidAqnaH || vIqta(gg) stu#kEstukE | yuqvamaqsmAsuq niya#cCatam | prapra# yaqj~japa#tiM tira || yE grAqmyAH paqSavO# viqSvarU#pAH | virU#pAqH santO# bahuqdhaika#rUpAH | tEShA(gm)# saptAqnAmiqha ranti#rastu | rAqyaspOShA#ya suprajAqstvAya# suqvIryA#ya || ya A#raqNyAH paqSavO# viqSvarU#pAH | virU#pAqH santO# bahuqdhaika#rUpAH ( ) | 31 (10)

vAqyustA(gm) agrEq pramu#mOktu dEqvaH | praqjApa#tiH praqjayA# sam~MvidAqnaH || iDA#yai sRuqptaM GRuqtava#ccarAcaqram | dEqvA anva#vindaqnguhA# hiqtam || ya A#raqNyAH paqSavO# viqSvarU#pAH | virU#pAqH santO# bahuqdhaika#rUpAH | tEShA(gm)# saptAqnAmiqha ranti#rastu | rAqyaspOShA#ya suprajAqstvAya# suqvIryA#ya || 32 (8)
anuvAkaM - 12

saqhasra#SIr.ShAq puru#ShaH | saqhaqsrAqkShaH saqhasra#pAt | sa BUmi#M ~MviqSvatO# vRuqtvA | atya#tiShThad-daSA~gguqlam || puru#Sha EqvEda(gm) sarva$m | yad-BUqtaM ~Myaccaq Bavya$m | uqtAmRu#taqtvasyESA#naH | yadannE#nAtiqrOha#ti || EqtAvA#nasya mahiqmA | atOq jyAyA(gg)#Scaq pUru#ShaH | 33 (10)

pAdO$&syaq viSvA# BUqtAni# | triqpAda#syAqmRuta#M diqvi || triqpAdUqrddhva udaiqtpuru#ShaH | pAdO$&syEqhABa#vAqt puna#H | tatOq viShvaq~g vya#krAmat | sAqSaqnAqnaqSaqnE aqBi || tasmA$d viqrADa#jAyata | viqrAjOq adhiq pUru#ShaH | sa jAqtO atya#ricyata | paqScAd BUmiqmathO# puqraH || 34 (10)

yatpuru#ShENa haqviShA$ | dEqvA yaqj~jamata#nvata | vaqsaqntO a#syAsIqdAjya$m | grIqShma iqddhmaH SaqraddhaqviH || saqptAsyA#san pariqdhaya#H | triH saqpta saqmidha#H kRuqtAH | dEqvA yad-yaqj~jaM ta#nvAqnAH | aba#ddhnaqn puru#ShaM paqSum || taM ~Myaqj~jaM baqrq.hiShiq praukShann# | puru#ShaM jAqtama#graqtaH | 35 (10)

tEna# dEqvA aya#janta | sAqddhyA RuSha#yaScaq yE || tasmA$d yaqj~jAth sa#rvaqhuta#H | samBRu#taM pRuShadAqjyam | paqSU(gg)stA(gg)Sca#krE vAyaqvyAn# | AqraqNyAn grAqmyAScaq yE || tasmA$d yaqj~jAth sa#rvaqhuta#H | RucaqH sAmA#ni jaj~jirE | CandA(gm)#si jaj~jirEq tasmA$t | yajuq-stasmA#dajAyata || 36 (10)

tasmAqdaSvA# ajAyanta | yE kE cO#BaqyAda#taH | gAvO# ha jaj~jirEq tasmA$t | tasmA$ jjAqtA a#jAqvaya#H || yat puru#ShaqM ~Mvya#dadhuH | kaqtiqdhA vya#kalpayann | muKaqM kima#syaq kau bAqhU | kAvUqrU pAdA#vucyEtE || brAqhmaqNO$&syaq muKa#mAsIt | bAqhU rA#jaqnya#H kRuqtaH | 37 (10)

UqrU tada#syaq yad-vaiSya#H | paqdByA(gm) SUqdrO a#jAyata || caqndramAq mana#sO jAqtaH | cakShOqH sUryO# ajAyata | muKAqdindra#ScAqgniSca# | prAqNAd vAqyura#jAyata || nAByA# AsIdaqntari#kSham | SIqrShNO dyauH sama#vartata | paqdByAM BUmiqr diSaqH SrOtrA$t | tathA# lOqkA(gm) a#kalpayann || 38 (10)

vEdAqhamEqtaM puru#ShaM maqhAnta$m | Aqdiqtyava#rNaqM tama#saqstu pAqrE | sarvA#Ni rUqpANi# viqcityaq dhIra#H | nAmA#ni kRuqtvA&Biqvadaqnq. yadAstE$ || dhAqtA puqrastAqdyamu#dAjaqhAra# | SaqkraH praviqdvAn praqdiSaqScata#sraH | tamEqvaM ~MviqdvAnaqmRuta# iqha Ba#vati | nAnyaH panthAq aya#nAya vidyatE || yaqj~jEna# yaqj~jama#yajanta dEqvAH | tAniq dharmA#Ni prathaqmAnyA#sann ( ) | tE haq nAka#M mahiqmAna#H sacantE | yatraq pUrvE# sAqddhyAH santi# dEqvAH || 39 (12) Special Korvai (jyAyAqnadhiq pUru#ShaH) (aqnyatraq puru#ShaH )
anuvAkaM - 13

aqdByaH samBU#taH pRuthiqvyai rasA$cca | viqSvaka#rmaNaqH sama#vartaqtAdhi# | tasyaq tvaShTA# viqdadha#d-rUqpamE#ti | tat puru#Shasyaq viSvaqmAjA#naqmagrE$ || vEdAqhamEqtaM puru#ShaM maqhAnta$m | Aqdiqtyava#rNaqM tama#saqH para#stAt | tamEqvaM ~MviqdvAnaqmRuta# iqha Ba#vati | nAnyaH panthA# vidyaqtE&ya#nAya || praqjApa#tiScaratiq garBE# aqntaH | aqjAya#mAnO bahuqdhA vijA#yatE | 40 (10)

tasyaq dhIrAqH pari#jAnantiq yOni$m | marI#cInAM paqdami#cCanti vEqdhasa#H || yO dEqvEByaq Ata#pati | yO dEqvAnA$M puqrOhi#taH | pUrvOq yO dEqvEByO# jAqtaH | namO# ruqcAyaq brAhma#yE || ruca#M brAqhmaM jaqnaya#ntaH | dEqvA agrEq tada#bruvann | yastvaiqvaM brA$hmaqNO viqdyAt | tasya# dEqvA asaqnvaSE$ ( ) || hrISca# tE laqkShmIScaq patnyau$ | aqhOqrAqtrE pAqrSvE | nakSha#trANi rUqpam | aqSvinauq vyAtta$m | iqShTaM ma#niShANa | aqmuM ma#niShANa | sarva#M maniShANa || 41 (17)
anuvAkaM - 14

BaqrtA san BriqyamA#NO biBarti | EkO# dEqvO ba#huqdhA nivi#ShTaH | yaqdA BAqraM taqndraya#tEq sa Bartu$m | niqdhAya# BAqraM punaqrasta#mEti || tamEqva mRuqtyumaqmRutaqM tamA#huH | taM BaqrtAraqM tamu# gOqptAra#mAhuH | sa BRuqtO BriqyamA#NO biBarti | ya E#naqM ~MvEda# saqtyEnaq Bartu$m || saqdyO jAqtamuqta ja#hAtyEqShaH | uqtO jara#ntaqM na ja#hAqtyEka$m | 42 (10)

uqtO baqhUnEkaqmaha#rjahAra | ata#ndrO dEqvaH sada#mEqva prArtha#H || yastadvEdaq yata# AbaqBUva# | saqndhAM caq yA(gm) sa#ndaqdhE brahma#NaiqShaH | rama#tEq tasmi#nnuqta jIqrNE SayA#nE | naina#M jahAqtyaha#ssu pUqrvyEShu# || tvAmApOq anuq sarvA$Scaranti jAnaqtIH | vaqthsaM paya#sA punAqnAH | tvamaqgni(gm) ha#vyaqvAhaq(gm)q sami$nthsE | tvaM BaqrtA mA#taqriSvA$ praqjAnA$m || 43 (10)

tvaM ~Myaqj~jastvamu# vEqvAsiq sOma#H | tava# dEqvA havaqmAya#ntiq sarvE$ | tvamEkO#&si baqhUnanuqpravi#ShTaH | nama#stE astu suqhavO# ma Edhi || namO# vAmastu SRuNuqta(gm) hava#M mE | prANA#pAnAvajiqra(gm) saqcaMra#ntau | hvayA#mi vAqM brahma#NA tUqrtamEta$m | yO mAM dvEShTiq taM ja#hi taM ~MyuvAnA || prANA#pAnau sam~MvidAqnau ja#hitam | aqmuShyAsu#nAq mA saMga#sAthAM ( ) | 44 (10)

taM mE# dEvAq brahma#NA sam~MvidAqnau | vaqdhAya# dattaqM tamaqha(gm) ha#nAmi || asa#jjajAna saqta Aba#BUva | yaM ~Mya#M jaqjAnaq sa u# gOqpO a#sya | yaqdA BAqraM taqndraya#tEq sa Bartu$m | paqrAsya# BAqraM punaqrasta#mEti || tadvai tvaM prAqNO a#BavaH | maqhAnBOga#H praqjApa#tEH | Buja#H kariqShyamA#NaH | yaddEqvAnprANa#yOq nava# ( ) || 45 (10)
